title: Bloomberg Markets: Heymann, Nilanjana Bhowmik on Women in VCs
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Heymann, Nilanjana Bhowmik on Women in VCs
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Maia Heymann and Nilanjana Bhowmik Co-Founders and General Partners Converge VC Discussing how their attempts to recruit each other lead to creating Converge and how their firm intends to differentiate. Bloomberg Contributor Woody Benson also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
